content:
As usual, we'll be having a training/discussion session for co-chairs, IG authors and other individuals who are involved in the creation of IGs and the management of FHIR artifacts.   Room is Convention 3.3 (grab your lunch first)

Topics of conversation include:

  • Common Jira issues (and how to address them)
  • Configuring Jira so it understands your IG
  • IG Publisher changes and using templates
  • whatever else you want to

NOTE: Lunch is only 1 hour, so try to grab your food as quickly as you can.  Will try to start the session at 1:10.  (And given the distance of some foods, we won't run longer than 1:50.)
